description.name: Tile wedges BIG - 9,0mm - 50pcs (100)
description.long_desc:
Reusable Tile Wedges 9.0mm


Effectively separates the tiles being laid and prevents them from shifting until the space between them is filled with grout.


Technical Specifications:



  • Made of high-quality plastic

  • For wall and floor tiles

  • Ensures perfect leveling

  • Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use

  • Maintains the proper spacing between tiles

  • Length: 35mm

  • Height: 9mm

  • Width: 9mm

  • Quantity: 50 pieces per pack

description.name: Adjustable wrench – extra wide jaw 0-34 mm 6" CrV
description.long_desc:
Swedish Adjustable Wrench 6" 34 mm - Your Toolbox's Reliable Companion


Are you looking for a tool that can meet any challenge? The Swedish adjustable wrench is the ideal choice for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who value quality, durability, and ease of use.


Invest in a tool that combines the highest quality craftsmanship, ergonomics, and reliability. The Swedish adjustable wrench guarantees satisfaction and efficiency, regardless of the task you face.


Key Product Features:


Exceptional Durability and Strength: Made from high-quality CrV tool steel, our adjustable wrench ensures unmatched durability and resistance to damage. With jaws hardened to 46-48 HRC, you can be confident that the tool will handle even the most demanding tasks.


Comfort and Ergonomics: The ergonomic handle made of TPR material ensures maximum working comfort, minimizing hand fatigue even during prolonged use. The TPR material not only fits perfectly in your hand but is also slip-resistant, increasing work safety.


Versatility of Applications: With an adjustable jaw range from 0 to 34 mm, this adjustable wrench is incredibly versatile and suitable for a wide range of applications, from home repairs to professional workshop tasks.


Technical Specifications:


Brand: Tvardy


Type of wrench: adjustable, Swedish


Wrench size: 6”


Jaw range: 0-34 mm


Material: CrV tool steel


Handle: TPR material


Brief product presentation:


https://www.youtube.com/shorts/0A5YQD9gQjM

description.name: Dead blow rubber hammer 45mm 640g
description.long_desc:
Our recoilless rubber mallet with a diameter of 45 mm and a weight of 640g is the perfect tool for professionals who value precision, efficiency, and safety during work. Designed for various applications, this rubber mallet is an essential equipment for every professional.


Technical specifications:



  • Mallet length: 30.5 cm

  • Head diameter: 4.5 cm

  • Head width: 10 cm

  • Loose shot inside the head eliminating the rebound effect of the mallet from the material


Main product features:




  • Recoilless operation: Made of rubber and with loose shot inside to eliminate recoil force, our rubber mallet eliminates the risk of splinters, making the work not only effective but also safe for the user and the surroundings.




  • Diameter 45 mm: The optimal diameter of the mallet ensures an excellent fit for various tasks, allowing precise strikes without excessive effort.




  • Weight 640g: Light yet sufficiently heavy, the mallet enables efficient work without straining wrists and arms.




  • Special grooved handle: The grooved handle provides a secure grip and reduces fatigue, allowing prolonged use of the tool. The end of the handle prevents accidental slipping of the mallet from the hand.




  • Versatile application: Excellent for use in construction, renovations, or even craftsmanship. Suitable for both precision work and more intensive tasks.

description.name: Ozone generator 28000mg/h
description.long_desc:
Do you want to have fresh and clean air in your home, office or car? Do you want to get rid of unpleasant odors, bacteria, viruses and allergens? If so, then ozone generator - ozonator with timer 1-60min is the solution for you!

Ozonator with a powerful performance of up to 28 000 mg/h is suitable for both domestic and industrial applications.

Ozonator allows you to adjust the time from 5 to 60 minutes, depending on your needs.

Technical specifications:

  • Performance: 28 000 mg/h
  • Timer: from 5 to 60 minutes
  • Power: 110 W
  • Power supply voltage: 230V / 50Hz

Ozone generator is a device that uses electric current to produce ozone from oxygen, which has the properties of cleaning and disinfecting the air. Here are some reasons and places where it is worth using the ozone generator:

  • Ozonator helps get rid of unpleasant odors, such as smoke, mustiness, sweat or animal fur.
  • Ozonator destroys bacteria, viruses, fungi, mold, mites, allergens and other harmful microorganisms that can cause diseases and allergies.
  • Ozonator improves the quality of air in your home, office, car, air conditioning, refrigerator, closet and other places where dust and dirt may accumulate.

Before you decide to buy an ozone generator, remember that ozone is toxic to humans and animals, so you should follow the manufacturer’s recommendations and not stay in the room during ozonation. After the process is finished, you should ventilate the room well, so that the ozone turns into safe oxygen.

description.name: Rivet nut adapter for drill M3-M10
description.long_desc:
Our rivet nut tool with a screwdriver adapter is an excellent instrument for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who value convenience, efficiency, and precision in the fastening process. This set has been carefully designed to provide ease of use and a wide range of applications.


Set Components:


Rivet Nut Adapter:
The robust and precise body, made of aluminum and TPR (thermoplastic rubber), ensures durability and an ergonomic grip.


Range of Rivet Nuts:
The set includes various sizes of rivet nuts, including M3, M4, M5, M6, M8, M10, allowing adaptation to different mounting needs.


Mounting Key:
The practical mounting key ensures easy and quick use of the rivet nut tool, enabling precise fastening of rivet nuts.


Main Product Features:


Versatility and Size Range:
Thanks to the variety of rivet nuts and an easily interchangeable adapter, the tool is suitable for many applications, from smaller tasks to more advanced installations.


Ergonomic Design:
The comfortable and non-slip handle guarantees work comfort even during extended use.


User-Friendly:
Intuitive design and the additional mounting key make the operation of the rivet nut tool straightforward and efficient.


High-Quality Materials:


Body:
Made of durable aluminum alloy combined with TPR, ensuring solidity, lightness, and user comfort.


Shank:
Cr-V steel (chrome-vanadium) provides durability and resistance to wear.


Rotary Shaft:
Cr-Mo steel (chrome-molybdenum) gives the tool stability and resistance to loads.

description.name: 12pcs glass cleaning scrapers set
description.long_desc:
If you are looking for reliable and comfortable tools for cleaning, then this set of GEKO cleaning knives is for you! The set contains 12 elements: A large cleaning knife and a small cleaning knife, each with 5 interchangeable blades. Whether you need to remove paint, glue, silicone, or other contaminants, from glass these knives will handle any task!

Technical Specification:

  • Material:
    Cleaning knife: ABS + TPR
    Blade: carbon steel

  • Set of elements:
    1 large cleaning knife + 5 pcs. interchangeable blades; blade size: approx. 100x18mm
    1 small cleaning knife + 5 pcs. interchangeable blades; blade size: approx. 39x19mm


Main product features:

  • The GEKO cleaning knives set is a 12-piece set of tools for removing contaminants from glass and smooth surfaces.

  • The knives are made of durable ABS + TPR material, which ensures excellent control and comfort of use.
    |
  • The blades are made of high-quality carbon steel, which provides precise cutting and long-lasting sharpness.

description.name: 33pcs S2 impact driver bits
description.long_desc:
If you're looking for a tool that will provide you with excellent quality, efficiency, and safety in every job, then this set of impact bits is for you. It includes 28 impact bits of various sizes and lengths, magnetic holders, a driver, and an adapter that will make using your screwdriver easier. All elements of the set are made of high-quality S2 material, which ensures exceptional durability and resistance to damage. This tool will revolutionize your screwdriver experiences and help you meet any challenge.


Set elements:



  • Material: S2 - reinforced Cr-V steel (chrome-vanadium) provides strength and wear resistance.

  • 60mm Magnetic Bit Holder - 1 pc.

  • 1/4" Magnetic Driver - 2 pcs.

  • 3/8" HEX Adapter 65mm - 1 pc.

  • 80mm Magnetic Extension - 1 pc.

  • S2 Impact Bits 25mm - 20 pcs. - PH1, PH2, PH2, PH3, PZ1, PZ2, PZ2, PZ3, TX10, TX15, TX15, TX20, TX20, TX25, TX25, TX30, TX30, TX40, TX40, SL6

  • 50mm Impact Bits - 8 pcs. - PH1, PH2, PH2, PZ1, PZ2, PZ2, TX20, TX25

description.name: Torque Wrench 1/4" 5-25Nm TVARDY
description.long_desc:
The Tvardy 1/4" Torque Wrench is a professional tool that allows precise tightening of screws and nuts with a predetermined force. With a torque adjustment range from 5 to 25Nm (44.3-221.3 lbf.in), it is ideal for applications where accuracy is required. Our torque wrench stands out for its ability to handle both right and left-handed threads.


Crafted from high-quality materials, the ratchet mechanism is made of chromoly steel SCM440 with a hardness of approximately 49 HRC, while other steel components are made of 40Cr steel.


*To prolong the lifespan of the wrench, remember to set the wrench to the lowest value after each use to prevent excessive spring stretching.


Product Features:



  • Professional torque wrench

  • Calibrated wrench – recalibration is recommended no later than after 5000 cycles

  • An indispensable tool wherever precise tightening of screws with a predetermined force is necessary

  • Features a clear scale with an additional micro-scale for precise torque adjustment

  • 1/4" drive size

  • Bi-directional torque measurement - a feature distinguishing our wrench is the ability to handle both right and left-handed threads

  • Characterized by very high accuracy of +-3%

  • The key component, the ratchet mechanism, is made of high-quality Cr-Mo steel labeled SCM440 with a hardness of 49 HRC

  • Other wrench components made of CR40 steel

  • Locking ring prevents accidental rotation of the handle, preventing changes to previously set parameters

  • Modern design, powder-coated finish


Technical Specifications:


Drive Size: 1/4”


Range: 5-25 Nm / 44.3-221.3 lbf.in


Torque Measurement Direction: Right / Left


Material: Ratchet mechanism made of Cr-Mo SCM440 steel, other components made of CR40 steel


Length: 240 mm

Range: 20-210 Nm / 14.8-155 lbf.ft


Torque Measurement Direction: Right / Left


Material: Ratchet mechanism made of Cr-Mo SCM440 steel, other components made of CR40 steel


Length: 510 mm


Finish: Powder coating
description.description:
The Tvardy 1/2" Torque Wrench is a professional tool that enables precise tightening of screws and nuts with a predetermined force. With a torque adjustment range from 20 to 210Nm (14.8-155 lbf.ft), it is ideal for applications where accuracy is required. Our torque wrench stands out for its ability to handle both right and left-handed threads.


Crafted from high-quality materials, the ratchet mechanism is made of chromoly steel SCM440 with a hardness of approximately 49 HRC, while other steel components of the wrench are made of 40Cr steel.


*To extend the lifespan of the wrench, remember to set the wrench to the lowest value after each use to prevent excessive spring stretching.


Product Features:



  • Professional torque wrench

  • Calibrated wrench – recalibration is recommended no later than after 5000 cycles

  • An indispensable tool wherever precise tightening of screws with a predetermined force is necessary

  • Features a clear scale with an additional micro-scale for precise torque adjustment

  • 1/2" drive size

  • Bi-directional torque measurement - a feature distinguishing our wrench is the ability to handle both right and left-handed threads

  • Characterized by very high accuracy of +-3%

  • The key component, the ratchet mechanism, is made of high-quality Cr-Mo steel labeled SCM440 with a hardness of 49 HRC

  • Other wrench components made of CR40 steel

  • Locking ring prevents accidental rotation of the handle, preventing changes to previously set parameters

  • Modern design, powder-coated finish


Technical Specifications:


Drive Size: 1/2”


Range: 20-210 Nm / 14.8-155 lbf.ft


Torque Measurement Direction: Right / Left


Material: Ratchet mechanism made of Cr-Mo SCM440 steel, other components made of CR40 steel


Length: 510 mm


Finish: Powder coating

description.name: Plastic welding gun kit 70W
description.long_desc:
Modern plastic welder-stapler with a power of 70W, equipped with 200 staples of various types. This tool will make your repair or project work quick, precise, and highly efficient.



  • Power: 70W

  • Power supply: 230V

  • Staple temperature: up to 600°C

  • Width of electrodes at the staple mounting point: 13-15mm

  • Power cord length: 155cm

  • LED lighting: yes

  • Heating: in 3 seconds


Application:



  • Welding plastics, eliminating gaps, and repairing holes without the use of nails,

  • repairing various cracks: horizontal, vertical, long, and short,

  • thermal cutting,

  • lead soldering,

  • hot smoothing.


Product features:



  • 4 types of staples: With the included 4 different types of staples, you can adapt the welder to various types of plastics and projects.

  • Universal application: Ideal for use at home, in the workshop, or even in a production facility. Perfect for repairing plastic items, creating prototypes, or even artistic work.


Included in the set:



  • 70W Plastic Welder

  • 200 staples

    • flat - 50 pcs.

    • internal - 50 pcs.

    • straight - 50 pcs.

    • sinus - 50 pcs.



  • Pliers

  • Upholstery knife

  • All packed in a convenient portable plastic case

description.name: 11pcs spiral deep extractor set
description.long_desc:
A set of long sockets for broken screws from Tvardy company is a perfect solution for those who have trouble unscrewing screws that are too tight, rusty or damaged. You don’t have to be frustrated and waste time on this task anymore. This set is an essential tool for anyone who works with mechanical elements. It doesn’t matter if you are a professional mechanic, a hobbyist or just care about your vehicle - this set will handle any situation.


Product features:

  • It consists of 11 elements of different sizes, from 6 mm to 19 mm.
  • They are made of high-quality steel chrome-molybdenum (CR-MO), which is resistant to wear and corrosion.
  • They have a long shape, which allows better access to hard-to-reach places.
  • They fit most standard socket wrenches and torque wrenches.

description.name: Paving hammer with rubber cover 1500g
description.long_desc:
Our 1500g rubber-headed paving mallet is a key tool for professionals and enthusiasts in the field of paving. Designed for efficient and precise work, this mallet ensures effective laying of paving stones without the risk of damage.


Technical specifications:



  • Head material: Steel

  • Head weight: 1500 g

  • Handle material: Wood


Product characteristics:




  • Weight 1500g: The optimal weight of the mallet provides a balance between striking force and controlled action, facilitating precise laying of paving stones.




  • Rubber overlay: Equipped with a high-quality rubber overlay, the mallet protects the paved surface from scratches and damage while ensuring even distribution of striking force.




  • Ergonomic handle: The comfortable handle of the mallet increases user convenience, reducing fatigue during prolonged work.




  • Solid construction: The mallet is made of durable materials, ensuring long-lasting performance and reliability, even with intensive use.

description.name: Rubber cover for paving hammer 1500g
description.long_desc:
The overlay is a crucial element of the paving mallet, protecting the paved surface from scratches and damage during the process of laying paving stones.




  • High-quality rubber protection: The overlay is made of durable and flexible rubber material that effectively absorbs the impact energy, simultaneously protecting the surface of the paving stones from damage.




  • Universal fit: Thanks to its flexible material, our overlay perfectly adapts to various types of paving mallets, making it compatible with many models available on the market.




  • Easy installation: The overlay is easy to put on the mallet head and equally easy to remove. This allows you to quickly adjust the tool to specific tasks.




  • Surface protection: The rubber surface not only safeguards the paving stones but also eliminates the risk of damage to other delicate surfaces, such as tiles or stone.

  • Rubber overlay: Equipped with a high-quality rubber overlay, the mallet protects the paved surface from scratches and damage while ensuring even distribution of striking force.




  • Ergonomic handle: The comfortable handle of the mallet increases user convenience, reducing fatigue during prolonged work.




  • Solid construction: The mallet is made of durable materials, ensuring long-lasting performance and reliability, even with intensive use.

description.name: Rubber cover for paving hammer 2000g
description.long_desc:
The overlay is a crucial element of the paving mallet, protecting the paved surface from scratches and damage during the process of laying paving stones.




  • High-quality rubber protection: The overlay is made of durable and flexible rubber material that effectively absorbs the impact energy, simultaneously protecting the surface of the paving stones from damage.




  • Universal fit: Thanks to its flexible material, our overlay perfectly adapts to various types of paving mallets, making it compatible with many models available on the market.




  • Easy installation: The overlay is easy to put on the mallet head and equally easy to remove. This allows you to quickly adjust the tool to specific tasks.




  • Surface protection: The rubber surface not only safeguards the paving stones but also eliminates the risk of damage to other delicate surfaces, such as tiles or stone.

NO-CLEAN is a self-cleaning foam gun that provides high quality and convenience of use. Thanks to its special design, the gun does not require cleaning after each use, saving time and money. It combines modern technology and high functionality. It is an ideal tool for professionals and amateurs who value quality and convenience.

  • Stainless steel valve and needle, which ensure precise and uniform application of foam
  • Lightweight and durable aluminum alloy gun body, which provides stability and ergonomics
  • Profiled handle with rubber grip, which provides comfort and safety during work

description.name: Lawn Rake steel 44x39cm

Metal fan rakes with dimensions of 44x39cm are a tool that will make it easier for you to clean the garden of leaves, grass and other waste. They have 22 teeth. These rakes are durable, functional and comfortable to use. Thanks to them, you can quickly and effectively tidy up your garden and enjoy its beauty.

Metal fan rakes 44x39cm 22T are a tool for cleaning leaves, grass and other waste from the garden.


The rakes are made of high-quality steel, have 22 teeth and elastic metal strips that adapt to the shape of the ground.


Thanks to the optimal dimensions of 44x39 cm, metal fan rakes 22T ensure ease and accuracy of work, allowing you to clean even hard-to-reach places in the garden.

description.name: 20mm Internal Bending Spring
description.long_desc:
Internal Spring for Bending PEX-AL-PEX Pipes 20mm is a key component in water and heating installation systems, providing reliability and safety during operation.


With our internal spring, you can bend pipes without worrying about their cracking or damaging the structure.


Precise Pipe Bending: The internal spring is designed with precision and uniformity in mind for bending PEX-AL-PEX pipes. Thanks to its construction and flexibility, users can achieve desired shapes without risking damage to the pipe structure.


Resistance to Breakage: Made of high-quality spring steel, our spring not only ensures precise bending but also resistance to accidental loads, minimizing the risk of pipe breakage or deformation.


Universal Application: Produced in a standard diameter of 20mm, the internal spring is compatible with many types of PEX-AL-PEX pipes available on the market, making it a versatile tool for various installation applications.


Efficiency and User Convenience: With ergonomic design and elastic properties, the internal spring provides users with comfort and efficiency during work. The bending process becomes faster and more controlled, resulting in effective installation finishing.


Technical Specifications:



  • Spring Diameter: 20mm

  • Length: 75 cm

  • Material: High-quality spring steel

  • Elasticity: 75mm

  • Application: Water and heating installation systems

description.name: Fleece polishing disc 125mm
description.long_desc:
Fiber flap disc is an indispensable tool for cleaning, grinding and polishing various types of metals, including stainless steel and aluminum. Thanks to the abrasive fiber, the disc perfectly removes all impurities, such as rust, paint or dirt, and evens out irregularities, joints and edges. The fiber flap disc prepares the surface for further polishing, giving it shine and smoothness.

The fiber flap disc has a diameter of 125 mm and a hole of 22.23 mm, which fits most angle grinders. The disc has a thickness of 12 mm and is made of high-quality abrasive fiber, which ensures long life and resistance to wear. The fiber flap disc can work with a maximum rotational speed of 12,200 rpm and peripheral 80 m/s, which guarantees fast and efficient work.

Product characteristics:

  • Disc diameter - 125 mm
  • Hole diameter - 22.23 mm
  • Type of polishing material - abrasive fiber
  • Fiber thickness - 12 mm
  • Maximum speed: rotational - 12,200 rpm peripheral - 80 m/s (depending on the rotational and disc diameter)

description.short_desc:
Drill Set with Countersink 5pcs - an indispensable tool for every handyman. Our drills guarantee long-lasting performance and precise cutting. The set includes five elements with diameters from 3 to 6 mm, making it ideal for working with various materials, such as plastic or wood. Thanks to the included countersink, our drills allow not only drilling holes, but also their precise finishing.


Product Characteristics:



  • The set includes five elements with diameters from 3 to 6 mm.

  • Ideal for working with various materials, such as plastic or wood.

  • Thanks to the included countersink, our drills allow not only drilling holes, but also their precise finishing.


Technical Specification:



  • Dimensions - 3 - 6 mm

  • Quantity - 5 pieces

description.name: Plasterboard hand rasp 140x40 mm
description.long_desc:
The drywall rasp is a reliable tool that will facilitate the processing of materials such as drywall, wood, plastics, during renovation and construction work.


Here's why it's worth choosing:


Rasp dimensions: The rasp measures 140x40 mm, allowing for precise planing and processing of various surfaces.


Durable body: The body made of durable plastic ensures the durability and reliability of this tool.


Ergonomic handle: Thanks to the ergonomic handle, work becomes more comfortable. Regardless of the intensity of use, you won't feel fatigue.


Versatility: The rasp will excel in processing various materials such as drywall, wood, and plastics.


Quick rasp replacement: Rasp replacement is simple and quick, allowing you to continue working without obstacles.


Technical specifications:


Rasp size: 140x40mm


Body material: durable plastic


Rasp material: spring steel 65Mn


Application: drywall, wood, plastics
